name: image-codec-analyzer
description: Analyze the effect of image optimization tools
author: Kaciras <Kaciras@protonmail.com>

scripts.compile: emcc -O2 --bind --closure 1 -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -I deps/butteraugli src/metrics.cpp deps/butteraugli/butteraugli/butteraugli.cc -o build/metrics.js
